import React, { useContext, useState } from "react"; import "./edit-profile.css"; import SideBar from "../../sidebar/SideBar"; import { Context } from "../../../context/Context"; import axios from "axios"; export default function EditProfile() { const [address, setAddress] = useState(""); const [accountName, setAccountName] = useState(""); const [accountNumber, setAccountNumber] = useState(""); const [bankName, setBankName] = useState(""); const [country, setCountry] = useState(""); const [success, setSuccess] = useState(false); const { user, dispatch } = useContext(Context); const PF = process.env.REACT_APP_PUBLIC_FOLDER; const handleSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); dispatch({ type: "UPDATE_START" }); const updatedUser = { userId: user._id, address, accountName, accountNumber, bankName, country, } try { const res = await axios.post("/publishers/" + user._id, updatedUser); setSuccess(true); dispatch({ type: "UPDATE_SUCCESS", payload: res.data }); window.location.reload(); } catch (err) { dispatch({ type: "UPDATE_FAILURE" }); } }; return (

Edit Profile New alerts

setAddress(e.target.value)} />
setAccountName(e.target.value)} />
setAccountNumber(e.target.value)} />
setBankName(e.target.value)} />
{success && ( Profile has been successfully updated! )}
); }
